name: Anime House
description:
IMPORTANT

This game is incomplete!! As of now, you can only play the first chapter of the Sasuke and Bakugou routes. The others will likely crash the game!

This is a completely self indulgent game I've been learning to use Renpy on.  Basically, you're on a new reality show (not unlike Bad Girl's Club or Celebrity Big Brother) with a collection of Anime characters. I don't plan on continuing this because I wanted to work on an original game, but I may come back and continue with this. Until then, here's what I have :)

I don't own any of the characters, background art or any sounds/music used for this game. The art of the characters were done by me and edit some of the images used as props, but once again I did not create them.
